name: The secret of FYNDEMOOR Park
detailed_description:
The Secret of FYNDEMOOR Park a game so big only the pc can hold it . You are Foster a would be gangster...something is a foot in this city and its up to you to find out what`s what! A graphic adventure game that`s never been so easy using the retro game engine system walking talking, taking is as simple as pointing the cursor and pressing a button . The secret of FYNDEMOOR Park offers adventure gamers a new kind of story telling experience that includes complex puzzles and conversations and side splitting humour . Available from CRAZY EYE MEDIA The secret of FYNDEMOOR Park sets new standards for pc gaming.

KEY FEATURES

  • 16-bit Retro Arcade graphics
  • Classic CRT-TV screen
  • 90`s aesthetics
  • Classic point and click adventure
  • Satire of the decade with Politically incorrect humour
  • Aliens, talking horse`s,swinger`s party`s,flying mermaids plus loads more entertainment
  • Go on a daring adventure in your attempt to become the most infamous gangster in FYNDEMOOR city

  • Intuitive game interface and controls provide a more interactive gameplay experience

  • Intentional in game bugs and comical glitches followed by badly scripted animations to give the game a authentic 90`s Charm...
    that sets it apart from the rest
  • The first and only 16-bit arcade point and click adventure game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3GHz or AMD Athlon 64 3000+
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB with shader model 2.0 capability
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compliant sound card
